channel.title: Comments on: Book Review – NHibernate 3.0 Cookbook
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: BEN
item.dc:creator: BEN
item.content:encoded:
hi….looks like the book was pretty much interesting for you…
itz more like the opposite for me…I’m kinda lost…some of the instructions are not quite productive..For instance, generating a database section required a removal of the console.readkey() line….otherwise the db wud not be generated…
please i need help with nhibernate 3.0. Any help will do

tnx.
